title: How to Be Happier
itunes:title: How to Be Happier
description:
Episode 451 - The ultimate goal is the be happier all of the time but have you really thought about what it would take to be happy all the time? Your happiness should not be left up to chance, it is something that you should take control of. In this episode, I describe how to create your perfect day.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
